name: distribution_releases
schema:
CREATE TABLE `distribution_releases` (
	`id` text PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL,
	`distribution_id` text NOT NULL,
	`slug` text NOT NULL,
	`version` text NOT NULL,
	`release_date` integer,
	`release_notes` text,
	`registry_url` text,
	`download_url` text,
	`sha256` text,
	`digest` text,
	`is_latest` integer DEFAULT false,
	`created_at` integer,
	`updated_at` integer,
	FOREIGN KEY (`distribution_id`) REFERENCES `distributions`(`id`) ON UPDATE no action ON DELETE cascade
)
